title: Do you have relationship OCD?
text: Is the waiting period for his text less thrilling and more excruciating? Do you often find yourself engaging in endless attempts to discern the love you both share? Are you constantly contemplating, what if he’s not the one? There’s a thin line between feeling the excitement that comes with the uncertainty in a relationship, and wallowing in anxiety for issues that are more often than not a whimsical weave of your own thoughts. Relationship worries can be a warning to a more serious mental health condition.Love and companionship is a lot about unpredictability, occasional doubts, and even self-searching at times. Like all other feelings this extreme emotion broods naturally, and should be embraced as the part and parcel of this beautiful journey. However, if such thoughts turn to potent anxiety, they start to hinder mental wellbeing and eat away at the relationship.
description: If being with your partner is making youranxious you might have relationship obsessive compulsive disorder. Find out how to manage this mental disorder.
